comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

First, sorry but i cant find how to report an broken webpage, there isnt any option on firefox 4 and also, this link is not working: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/page.cgi?id=broken-website.html

Ok, the problem is with this website: https://lojavirtual.vivo.com.br/?ide_unf=1&ide_reg=1

It works only on IE. Try to click on the above menu, doesnt work.

This also doenst work on firefox 3.x

Ty.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Goto: https://lojavirtual.vivo.com.br/?ide_unf=1&ide_reg=1
2.Try to click on any of this menu item: http://cl.ly/5MQP
Actual Results:  
Nothing, is that the problem =p

Expected Results:  
Open the seletec item.
comments.creator: master_caio2005@hotmail.com
